pr_title: [Dialogue] Part 9: Shims for Lesser Used Services: AtlasDB -> TimeLock

timeline.bodyText: I'd recommend putting the word 'shim' in here so that it's super clear which ones are using the 'full dialogue' codegen vs the feign thingy.
timeline.author: iamdanfox

timeline.bodyText: only used in one place... inline?
timeline.author: iamdanfox

replies.bodyText: I tried to write it that way at first... but most of the HTTP libs aren't visible in the atlasdb-config project (which seems kind of reasonable - that's the intention behind the atlasdb-conjure project) so this class was needed
replies.author: jeremyk-91
